resources.string: 1F, No. 188, Chenggong Rd., Neihu Dist., Taipei 114, Taiwan

Our Ambition is to make the finest specialty coffee. We provide every coffee lover with a cup of personalized and delicious coffee. All the coffee beans are hand-baked by Louisa\'s professional baking peasers and baked in person to ensure the most important freshness of the coffee beans, which are handed to the customers by professional barters.
